name: observations
title: Observations
description: Table with observations based on the media files. Associated with deployments (`deploymentID`), sequences (`sequenceID`) and optionally individual media files (`mediaID`). Observations can mark non-animal events (camera setup, human, blank) or one or more animal observations (`observationType` = `animal`) of a certain taxon, count, life stage, sex, behaviour and/or individual.

fields.name: observationID
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the observation.

fields.name: sequenceID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the sequence (collection of media files grouped by a predefined `sequenceInterval`) that is the source of the observation. Foreign key to `media:sequenceID`.

fields.name: mediaID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the media file that is the source of the observation. Foreign key to `media:mediaID`. Leave empty for sequence-based observations.

fields.name: observationType
fields.description: Type of observation. All categories in this vocabulary have to be understandable from an AI point of view. `unknown` describes classifications with a confidence level below some predefined threshold i.e. neither humans nor AI can say what was recorded.

fields.name: cameraSetup
fields.description: `true` if the observation is part of the camera setup process (camera deployment, pickup, maintenance).

fields.name: taxonID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the `scientificName` according to the taxonomic reference list defined by `taxonIDReference` in the Data Package metadata.

fields.name: scientificName
fields.description: Scientific name of the observed individual(s).

fields.name: count
fields.description: Number of observed individuals (optionally of given life stage, sex and behaviour).

fields.name: countNew
fields.description: Number of new (= previously uncounted) individuals in the associated media file (`mediaID`) taking into account the entire sequence (`sequenceID`) (optionally of given life stage, sex and behaviour).

fields.name: lifeStage
fields.description: Age class or life stage of observed individual(s).

fields.name: behaviour
fields.description: Dominant behaviour of observed individual(s), ideally expressed as controlled values (e.g. grazing, browsing, rooting, vigilance, running, walking). A combination of dominant (first) and additional behaviours can be expressed as as a pipe (`|`) separated list.

fields.name: individualID
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the observed individual.

fields.name: classifiedBy
fields.description: Name or unique identifier of the person or AI algorithm that classified the observation.

fields.name: classificationTimestamp
fields.description: Date and time of the classification, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssÂ±hh:mm`).

fields.name: classificationConfidence
fields.description: Accuracy confidence of the classification. Expressed as a probability, with `1` being maximum confidence. Provide an approximate value for human classifications.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the observation.

fields.name: _id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the observation as assigned by the data management system.
